languages.text: "Сестра, умерьте пыл. Ваш энтузиазм похвален, однако в первую очередь я должен выяснить намерения Архиврага, а не растоптать его проявления без оглядки".
"Sister, tame your fervour. Your zeal is laudable, but first I must ascertain the intentions of the Archenemy, not crush its manifestations without a second thought."
languages.original_text: "Сестра, умерьте пыл. Ваш энтузиазм похвален, однако в первую очередь я должен выяснить намерения Архиврага, а не растоптать его проявления без оглядки".

traits.locale_text: "Sister, tame your fervour. Your zeal is laudable, but first I must ascertain the intentions of the Archenemy, not crush his manifestations without a second thought."
"Sister, tame your fervour. Your zeal is laudable, but first I must ascertain the intentions of the Archenemy, not crush his manifestations without a second thought."
"Sister, tame your fervour. Your zeal is laudable, but first I must ascertain the intentions of the Archenemy, not crush his manifestations without a second thought."
"Sister, tame your fervour. Your zeal is laudable, but first I must ascertain the intentions of the Archenemy, not crush his manifestations without a second thought."

languages.text: “修女，要控制住你的狂热。你的热情值得称赞，但在此之前，我必须先查明混沌大敌在酝酿着什么阴谋，而不是不假思索地粉碎它的化身。”
languages.original_text: "Sister, tame your fervour. Your zeal is laudable, but first I must ascertain the intentions of the Archenemy, not crush its manifestations without a second thought."

traits.locale_text: “修女，要控制住你的狂热。你的热情值得称赞，但在此之前，我必须先查明混沌大敌在酝酿着什么阴谋，而不是不假思索地粉碎它的化身。”

languages.text: «Hermana, temple su fervor. Su pasión es loable, pero primero debo descubrir las intenciones del Archienemigo, no aplastar sus manifestaciones sin pensar».
languages.original_text: "Sister, tame your fervour. Your zeal is laudable, but first I must ascertain the intentions of the Archenemy, not crush its manifestations without a second thought."

traits.locale_text: «Hermana, temple su fervor. Su pasión es loable, pero primero debo descubrir las intenciones del Archienemigo, no aplastar sus manifestaciones sin pensar».

languages.text: 「シスター、その熱情を抑えるのだ。その熱意は称賛に値するが、渾沌の勢力の意図を確かめなければならない。無闇にその発現を潰してはならない」
languages.original_text: "Sister, tame your fervour. Your zeal is laudable, but first I must ascertain the intentions of the Archenemy, not crush its manifestations without a second thought."

traits.locale_text: 「シスター、その熱情を抑えるのだ。その熱意は称賛に値するが、渾沌の勢力の意図を確かめなければならない。無闇にその発現を潰してはならない」

languages.text: "Schwester, mäßigt Eure Leidenschaft. Euer Eifer ist lobenswert, aber zuerst muss ich die Intentionen des Erzfeindes ermitteln, anstatt seine Manifestationen gedankenlos zu zerschmettern."
languages.original_text: "Sister, tame your fervour. Your zeal is laudable, but first I must ascertain the intentions of the Archenemy, not crush its manifestations without a second thought."

traits.locale_text: "Schwester, mäßigt Eure Leidenschaft. Euer Eifer ist lobenswert, aber zuerst muss ich die Intentionen des Erzfeindes ermitteln, anstatt seine Manifestationen gedankenlos zu zerschmettern."

languages.text: « Calmez vos ardeurs, ma sœur. Votre zèle vous fait honneur, mais avant d'anéantir toute manifestation du Grand Ennemi, je dois d'abord déterminer ses intentions. »
languages.original_text: "Sister, tame your fervour. Your zeal is laudable, but first I must ascertain the intentions of the Archenemy, not crush its manifestations without a second thought."

traits.locale_text: « Calmez vos ardeurs, ma sœur. Votre zèle vous fait honneur, mais avant d'anéantir toute manifestation du Grand Ennemi, je dois d'abord déterminer ses intentions. »

languages.text: "Rahibe, coşkunu biraz dizginle. Hevesli olduğun çok net ancak öncelikle Şerbaşı'nın niyetlerinden emin olmalıyım, tezahürlerine ipini koparmış gibi saldırmamalıyız."
languages.original_text: "Sister, tame your fervour. Your zeal is laudable, but first I must ascertain the intentions of the Archenemy, not crush its manifestations without a second thought."

traits.locale_text: "Rahibe, coşkunu biraz dizginle. Hevesli olduğun çok net ancak öncelikle Şerbaşı'nın niyetlerinden emin olmalıyım, tezahürlerine ipini koparmış gibi saldırmamalıyız."
